ftbquests.chapter.armors_and_weapons.que: &fThe flesh speaks, whispering absolute power to you.
&fDo you dare to listen to its secrets?
&fUse a higher-tier plate carrier for an optimal upgrade.
&fPress &eU&r&f on duct tape to view other crafting recipes.
&fCraft &a4 cosmetic pieces&r&f of armor or a helmet to show your style on the battlefield.
&fIf you don't have enough leather, check broadcasts for a cook or butcher.
&fYou can also use a grindstone to get leather scraps and craft backpacks or armor.
&fMerge armor, torso, and limbs into a single being.
&fThe line between you and them ceases to exist.
&fPowerful with a very precise shot, thanks to its &asophisticated diamond carving&r&f.
&fBiomechanical weapons are assembled with nerve tissue.
&fYour hunting instinct reaches its fullest expression.
An upgrade to leather armor; it's so dense they won't be able to cut you (negates bleeding).
&fThe horde won't get through; the &c&lRed Infection&r&f will burn before it reaches you.
&fA basic set of armor, but &a&lbetter than nothing&r&f.
&fWearing all &a4 pieces&r&f of a set grants &b&lspecial bonuses&r&f.
&fIt has no &aknockback&r&f when firing, allowing consecutive &b&lrapid shots&r&f.
&fArmor designed to face zombies and the infected.
&fArrows coated in substances or made with special materials, granting them useful properties.
&fOrdinary armor won't cut it—you need one designed to &c&lresist bites&r&f.
&fTo craft arrows, first make an &barchery table&r&f.
&fRight-click with a feather to obtain the required &afeathers&r&f.
&cCareful with the sharp edges&r&f, and don't get too close!
&fThe grindstone lets you sharpen your weapons with &nShift + right-click&r&f and repair them if they have less than &c&l33%&r&f durability.
&fDelegate routine tasks and save time for what really matters.
The abacus lets you measure distances in straight lines; it's very useful for building.
The backpack lets you store and carry more items in it.
Equip it with &eright-click&r and open it with the &eB&r key.
&cYou need a shelf or to empty the backpack &nto unequip it&r.
&fA feat of engineering: maximum power, durability, and unmatched &c&ldark aura&r&f.
&fIdeal for medium prey: it offers a balance between &clight weight&r&f and &adurable strength&r&f.
&fThese essential tools let you mine and chop to survive.
&fBows have knockback (&aknockback&r&f) tied to their strength and weight.
&fThis basic bow is &aideal for small prey&r&f thanks to its stealthy shot.
&fIn this world, magic exists only in myths and legends…
&fWith the clipboard you can devise upgrades for weapons, tools, or armor.
&7Press &eU&r&7 or right-click in search to view possible recipes.
&k&0The distinction between human and creature no longer exists.
&fCraft repair kits, but be careful! If they're too heavy, they could slow you down.
&fCarry them in your backpack to avoid hassle.
&fHeavy helmet, chestplate, and greaves with extra plating for &b&lreinforced immunity&r&f against bites and attacks.
So comfortable that it feels like your wounds vanish even when you're hungry, and it also protects from the cold.
&c&lDo you think this is a joke?&r
&fIn the inventory, next to your character's face, there's a white square for equipping items.
&fYou can equip a spyglass without taking up the hotbar, using the &eG&r&f key.
&fConnect the reconstructed wings to activate an acrobatic gliding system.
Although it's heavy, you feel protected.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_1.quest1116053: With this armor you feel energized.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_1.quest1455320: &fCraft shears with &a&lraw copper&r&f to gather leaves.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_1.quest2082922: &7&oTip: Don't place a campfire next to wood
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_1.quest2596479: &fTurn the &6flour&r&f into &6dough&r&f and bake it to make &6bread&r&f.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_1.quest3177618: An upgrade to leather armor; it's so dense they won't be able to cut you (negates bleeding).
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_1.quest3663261: &fIt's important to understand how your bow's weight and power affect you.
&fAlso, use the right arrow for each situation.
&fFor now, you have this basic gear provided by Central.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_1.quest3878419: &fAnnouncement of the start of the &bProject Genesis&r&f
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_1.quest5495758: &fPress &eT&r&f with your inventory open to &oshow/hide&r&f the trash bin.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_1.quest5541590: Plant and harvest "Underroot Seeds" or wheat.
Plant and harvest cave tree seeds
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_1.quest6455942: &fYou can add chests to &bdogs&r&f and &bcats&r&f so they can accompany you.
&fYou can also pet the &bdogs&r&f with &nShift + right-click&r&f.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_1.quest7564791: With a flint knife you can collect straw from grass to make ropes.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_1.quest8391268: &fIt seems some &a&lstrange frogs&r&f have formed a small &a&lcommune&r&f.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_1.quest8974368: So comfortable that it feels like your wounds vanish even when you're hungry, and it also protects from the cold.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_1.quest8986585: &fYou can do parkour: here's the book.
&fUse &eC&r&f to lie down, &eCtrl&r&f to sprint, then crouch quickly for a powerful jump.
&fPress &eAlt&r&f to dodge, and latch on or run along walls by holding right-click.
&fTo run normally, double-tap &eW&r&f and hold &eCtrl&r&f to sprint.
&fPress &eF5&r&f three times in first-person to get an over-the-shoulder view.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_1.title: &l&2Chapter 1: Rise to a New World&r
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quest2045958: &fStudy how motion generates mechanical stress and improve your machines.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quest2632661: &fOpen the weapon list and study their stats before choosing.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quest2785461: &fConnect the mill to &6gears&r&f from the sides or below.
&fAdd belts and shafts to optimize the milling process.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quest3316280: &fObtain underground resources and smelt them into useful materials.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quest3808425: &fBuild a &a&lfishing rod&r&f or a &c&lbutcher's knife&r&f to secure food.
&fChoose your tool: catch fresh fish or butcher animals to survive.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quest6083003: Create a &bmetal sheet&r and steel with a &bmechanical press&r; remember to supply power so it works— a &bhand crank&r should do.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quest7034091: &fCentral has unlocked a file in your &bPDA&r&f (optional).
&fCheck your device to uncover secrets that will change the course of your adventure.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quest7357510: &fCreate the weapons and ammo workbenches to defend yourself under extreme conditions.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quest7821659: Industrial pliers let you handle and store radioactive items with no side effects.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quest8206211: &fIn stressful situations, sometimes you just need to &lact fast&r&f — but don't overdo it!
&fYou might find &a&lseeds&r&f in the savanna for future crops.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.quest8397221: &bSome&r items can be recycled. This usually &bappears&r reflected in their &bdescription&r.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_2.title: &l&aChapter 2: A Forgotten Story&r
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.image.hovert: The following quests are missing lore and are likely to change
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quest1867076: Energy hotspots and “interference” have been detected in different locations. They need to be investigated with utmost caution...
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quest1896384: The origin of the maelstrom... its gestation
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quest2220112: Hello survivor, we are Central's Reconnaissance branch. Since you've built a communications tower, we can send you on search missions and offer good rewards in return. Remember: don't ask questions, and you're here for a good reason.
For the antenna and console to work, you'll need electrical power from an alternator,
Click here to see a quest that might be useful to you
(unlockable as you progress through the Create chapter)
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quest2471827: Click to search for info about the CDU
Click to search for info about the scanner
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quest3155037: We found what seems like a dwelling with strange activity. You should go check what's going on.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quest3231078: Click to search for info about the Zoaholic
Click to search for info about the Incubator
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quest3478385: Find an oil platform with a submarine
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quest3918230: Click to search for info about the BCU
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quest3928406: We've located a strange heat source; go there and check what it is. If needed, send samples.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quest4343642: We're sending you the location of a polar research center. It seems related to the ice mines, but it should be safe.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quest5854195: A signal was received from what appears to be a chapel. Go investigate—maybe there’s more hope this time.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quest5916160: We’ve detected anomalous thermal signals in an abandoned church. There may be survivors—or, worst case, the Red Plague has taken root. &oThe Lord will know.&r
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quest6950828: Central wants you to head to this location and send back some lab samples. Don’t touch anything you shouldn’t. Equip yourself properly to collect samples.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quest7183571: An old hospital seems to be of interest to Central—go investigate the area. Send samples and report any survivors. There should be some useful gadgetry from the lab wing. Maybe it still has old samples from an infected subject.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quest7817567: Click to search for info about the CDU
Click to search for info about the anti-spore mask
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.quest9208784: We found records pointing to abandoned mining facilities. Bring us samples of whatever’s there and stay alert.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_3.title: &l&cChapter 3: Ruins and Lost Tales&r
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.image.hovert: More info on the Red Plague here
You'll need to superheat a Blaze Burner,
Check the quests in Re-Creating the World.
(you might need to progress the quests here first)
(you'll need to progress quests first to complete them)
(you'll need to progress quests first to complete them)
(you'll need to progress quests first to complete them)
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quest1245248: Armor that offers great radiation protection; if you upgrade it with Anti-Radiation Level 1, it should protect against 96%% of radiation!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quest1531196: &bRemember&r that the &bbest defense&r is &bprevention&r and a quick reaction.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quest1699926: A strange, unknown ore—old tycoons and corporations fought over it, others mined in search of it...
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quest3926875: With these resources, you should be able to craft more powerful firearms and ammo, increasing your chances of surviving stronger enemies.
&7&o(You can also find quartz blocks in cities)&r
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quest4289502: Find or generate the dangerous yet valuable Netherite.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quest5055063: A substance crystallized into a star shape, with high purity and unique properties!
&o&8Tip: In the second phase, use melee weapons to deflect projectiles (TACZ knives don't work).
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quest5112379: I don't think there's a happy ending...
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quest6008780: In the lab, you found information about a dangerous experiment; apparently you can extract an unstable solid from powerful, ancient enemies...
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quest6175836: It's time to upgrade your gear and learn to create or obtain better ingredients.
Your own base or bunker will be essential!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quest7910865: It's time to put your knowledge to the test!
&bWill you be able to create it?
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quest8019693: Take your gear to the next level with upgrade schematics—here are some enchantments you can craft.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quest8124741: Thanks to the latest advances in technology, your automaton is stronger and smarter.
Remember to apply iron patches when you see cracks!
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quest8191206: &bTo&r be able to &bmove comfortably or settle down&r you'll &bneed to prepare&r against radiation.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.quest8499822: A refined drop from those who have lived through a cataclysm...
A sacrifice for the greater good?
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_4.title: &l&eChapter 4: Reinforcing the Foundations

ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quest5017411: A stable Netherite ingot, commonly used in high-end military-grade gear and research laboratories.

ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quest6459865: A military-grade ingot used for large armor, some safes, and bunkers or panic rooms.
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quest7004323: Be careful what you do, calamity might fall upon you...

ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.quest8754460: An &c&cincrease&r&c in the aggression of the &infected&r has been detected; it is recommended to take shelter or initiate an offensive.
It's recommended &busing advanced equipment&r and &eapplying enhancements to equipment&r.

ftbquests.chapter.chapter_5.title: &l&9Chapter 5: The Offensive Begins
ftbquests.chapter.chapter_6.title: &l&0Chapter 6: The End, and the Beginning...&r
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest1898035227: You can set up multiple mechanical assemblers to craft things that were once impossible!
Grinder wheels, autorepair blueprint enhancements, cars, planes, and much more!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest2917754501: Hold the &b&lW&r key to view tutorials on how to use the different elements of &o&bCreate.&r&r
Remember to experiment, look at crafting or machine uses, and see the "@Create" catalog, these are the best tips!
&6&oSome missions have green arrows below the description that allow you to change pages, &ndon't forget it&r
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest3266662894: &7&oDifferent types of generators generate different units of mechanical stress (SU) and rotate at different intensities (RPM), up to a maximum of 256 RPM.&r&r
The higher the RPM, the faster machines will go, but they will require more SU.
-Mechanical stress units (&bSU&r) can &bincrease&r &bby combining&r multiple &bgenerators&r into &bthe same system&r.
The more machines you add, the more can connect to a system and with higher RPM.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest3299095881: These items allow you to interact with other mod blocks as follows:
-The &b&lgoggles&r&r allow you to see &binformation&r about the blocks you look at.
-The &b&lspeedometer and stress meter&r &rmeasure&r the units &bRPM and SU&r respectively.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest3517148669: &7&oTip: You can make a Blackstone farm that mines into coal.
&o&7Tip: You can use a mechanical arm to feed blaze burners with coal
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest3577232533: On the &bgreen face&r of a &bwindmill bearing&r, you must &bplace&r a minimum of &b8 blocks of wool or sail&r.
Then, &bright-click&r the windmill bearing, and it will &bstart to rotate&r.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest3803363249: A basic steam generator can be made using 4 &bcampfires&r with 4 &bfluid tanks&r on top and a &bsteam engine&r, provided it's supplied with water constantly.
Each level of the steam engine allows adding a block of &bSteam Engine&r.
&o&7Press the green arrow for a layered explanation (&lnext page&r&7 description).&r
&oFirst click on the steam engine blueprints and remove the interface, then right-click to place the structure. Remove it by clicking again on the plans.&r
-On the first layer, place &b4 campfires&r (it may appear red if placed at the wrong angle) and &b3 water sources&r (surrounded by blocks) &bwhere indicated&r.
-Place &b4 fluid tanks&r on the campfires, then place the &bsteam engine&r where indicated. Next, place a &blarge gear&r, an &baxle&r in front, and the &bmechanical pump&r.
-Add the &b4 pipes&r, &b2 small gears&r, and the &bhandle&r last.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest4047891335: You can use soul campfire conversion to create these items via a &bfan&r with the &bsoul campfire&r in front.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest4346571646: Grinding often gives more common or rare resources.
But in some cases allows for &aunique items&r:
-&bBasalt&r for oxidized iron nuggets, which can be turned into oxidized ingots and then iron nuggets.
-&bBlackstone&r can give &6coal&r and sometimes pieces of Netherite that can be refined into &6netherite&r.
A list of things to grind
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest4702336297: The &b&lmechanical drill&r allows you to &bmine&r the &bblocks&r in front of it.
You can use it to &bautomatically mine&r generators of any kind of stone.

&o&7If you place lava and water and also some special block, you can generate different blocks, for this check through the EMI for the &r&3world interaction tab&r&7, more precisely the &r&3lava interactions.&r&r
The &b&lmechanical saw&r allows you to &bfell an entire tree&r while destroying the &bbase&r of the &btrunk&r of the &btree&r.
You can use it for &bautomated logging&r and make a &bwood farm&r.
The &b&lmechanical harvester&r allows for &bautomatic harvesting&r of a crop &band sowing&r the same crop &bthat it harvests&r.
The &b&lmechanical plow&r allows removing non-complete blocks when moving it or &bcreating farmland&r it passes over by connecting it to a &bmobile gadget&r
-The &b&lmechanical roller&r allows &bremoving blocks&r that are &bon the path&r of a &bmobile gadget&r or &bplacing blocks&r &bwhere it will pass&r, provided it is connected to a chest with blocks.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest4767633421: &oTry connecting a lever with a gear to a mill.

-Linear &bconnections&r like the &bcranks&r must &bconnect&r to other linear connections like the &bfaces of a gear&r. The &btoothed connections&r like the &bsides&r of a &bgear&r must connect to other toothed connections to transfer movement, such as the &btoothed sides&r of a &bgrindstone&r.
&7&oThere are different types of movement generators. But the most basic is a crank where you are the engine, consuming your food.&r&r
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest4963900655: -In a &b&ldeposit&r you can &bplace items&r statically &bwhile&r they are &bbeing processed&r.
-The &b&landesite tunnel&r allows connecting &bmultiple mechanical belts&r in a T or X form &bto divide or merge items&r being transported.
-The &b&landesite funnel&r allows &binserting or extracting&r items &bvertically or horizontally&r to inventories, like the items vault.
-The &b&lobject vault&r allows &bstoring large amounts of items&r.
It can &bconnect to itself&r, in patterns like: 1x1, 2x2, or 3x3; at its base to create a bigger single inventory, and/or increase height, up to a maximum of 3x3 base and 9 in height.
&o&7Also compatible with Tom's Simple Storage terminal!
&oHow to flatten 64 ingots with a press, but leave a block of vertical space between press and deposit.
-A &b&lweight deposit&r displays the number of &bitems&r you mark &by throwing them&r, &after&r selecting with &bshift+right click&r a &btarget&r &band&r then placing it.
after &bselecting&r with &bshift+right click&r a &btarget&r &band&r then placing it.
&oRequires &bbeing connected to a generator&r to launch the items.
-The &b&lstaffs&r allow &bitems+r to &bmoving&r &bitems&r &bdownwards&r &band&r diagonally when connected to each other.
&n&oWhen a block is mined above, it automatically goes into your inventory (without falling to the ground).
&oThey also &ballow&r &bplacing items within inventories&r like the object warehouse, deposits, or mechanical belts.&r
&o&bIf you place a fan&r blowing air below the duct, &byou can propel upwards&r and diagonally the &bitems!&r&r
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest5099212019: &7&oTip: You can make a Black Stone farm that converts into coal.
&o&7Tip: You can use a mechanical arm to feed the blaze burners.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest5209877602: -The &b&lmechanical arm&r allows items to be moved and used or transported to other places.

With &bright click&r and the &bmechanical arm equipped&r, select an item if the selection is in &bblue it will pick&r items from there; if it's &byellow it will deposit&r them. Finally, place it and provide rotational energy to make it work.
&o&7You can assign it to retrieve from a deposit (marked in blue) with carbon blocks and feed a blaze burner (marked in yellow)&r.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest5758056556: -A &b&lgear&r transfers movement &blinearly&r, by &bits sides&r via a toothed border.
&oIf you connect gears together, you change the direction of rotation.

-The &b&ltransmission chains&r coated, when placed &bone beside another&r, link up, allowing &bto displace&r &bmovement&r a few blocks sideways, &o&lit can also be &bconnected vertically (90º) to each other &r
&oo combine it with gears to make it more useful!&r
Once placed, they &ballow&r &btransferring&r movement &band&r also &btransporting items&r on them in the form of items.
-The &b&ltransmission box&r and &b&lvertical transmission box&r allow &bmultiple linear connections&r in several directions, but &beach face&r has a &bdifferent&r sense of &brotation&r.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest6447147096: A &b&lsequential assembly&r consists of a &bset of processes&r applied &bon an item&r that usually needs to be repeated.
If you search through EMI for how an object is created, it will show you an assembly sequence where it will appear:
-The &binitial item&r with an &barrow to the final item&r
-&bAbove the arrow&r will appear &ba group of processes&r that must be done in order &bto create the desired item&r
-&bBelow the arrow&r &bthe number of times to repeat the above processes&r detailed above (in left to right order) &bbefore completing it&r.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest6764698794: Feed a &bdispenser&r (pointing at a &bdeposit&r) with lava using a &bmechanical pump&r, prepare a &bmechanical press&r and connect them to a system for &bsupplying RPM and SU&r.
&o&7Tip: I recommend going deep underground and looking for a lava lake to make a lot of blaze rods, carrying out the assembly there (you can place a hose reaching the lava lake).&r
&nTo manufacture a blaze rod you need: &r
Apply &b2 times with the lava dispenser&r and compress &b1 time with a mechanical press&r, &64 times&r this process in this order
Sequential assembly to create a blaze rod
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest6766421570: -The press allows creating sheets of different ingots.
-The roller creates threads or rods from minerals.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest6877510690: You can use a &bfan&r with &bwater&r in front to retrieve gold by washing red sand.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest7294753627: -If one of the &bwheel's faces&r is in &bcontact&r with a &bwater current&r, it will rotate and &bgenerate movement&r.
&7&oThe larger the wheel, the greater the SU but the lower the RPM.&r&r
&7&o(You can aesthetically change the type of wood by using some type of wood on the wheels)
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest7747812065: -Allows adding a list of accepted or denied items.
For example: In two conflicting recipes, it can be used to fix it.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest7771025919: These blocks allow you to make &6mobile gadgets.
&l&bChassis:
-There are different types of chassis
-They allow connecting these blocks (if their texture is connected) without using glue.
&l&bPortable storage interface:
-If a store is within a mobile gadget and it also has this block.
If at any time another interface coincides with the gadget's (nozzle with nozzle and with 1 block distance) blocks can be inserted (duct) or extracted (funnel) between interfaces.
&l&6Elevator:
-An &b&lelevator pulley&r with a structure underneath (stuck with glue) with a component controller will form an elevator.

-To create floors, you need to add at least 3 &b&lredstone contacts&r, 2 looking at each other, and only 1 in the elevator structure (with glue), while the others need to be vertically aligned when the structure descends or ascends it will stop when the elevator contact sees either of the others.
-The &b&lcontroller&r allows changing floors with the mouse wheel and then right-clicking.
&oWhether it's a mechanical arm harvesting wheat or chopping trees, a rail-driven drill, an elevator, and much more! &r
The &l&bcart assembler&r:
-If you place a structure on this and then activate it with reston, when a cart passes, it will drag the structure.
-If you place drills, for example, on the cart, whenever it has tracks powered by redstone below it will be able to move the drills.
&o&8-Just remember to use &bglue&r&8&o to stick all the blocks that need &bto move together&r.
&o&8-And if you place a chest or storage in the gadget using glue, the gadgets will be able to use or store blocks&r
The &b&lmechanical bearing&r:
-Allows creating rotating gadgets on their axis if attached to the adhesive side.
-When started with a right-click the mechanical bearing, if it stops it will return to blocks to the solid form, but you can modify this behavior.
&l&bGlue:
-Joins selected blocks.
Create 2 to complete
Machines and mobile gadgets
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest7812466035: a dispenser with water and below a deposit that has a magma block.
&7The magma block forms when lava and water with rising bubbles meet.
You can feed the blaze burner with any kind of fuel.
Optionally, if you give it a straw, it will consume flammable liquids.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest7958252600: Give a blaze burner a nudge and supply it with liquid fuel through pipes.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest8015852464: An alternative to the blaze burner that works with liquid fuel.
The higher the RPM, the hotter and faster it burns (make sure it rotates in the correct direction).
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest8115739043: -To &bpower an alternator&r, you’ll need about &b2 thousand SU&r and a speed of &b32 RPM&r.
-Equivalent to 4 large water wheels (in stress units), and applying a 3:1 gear ratio.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest8301561909: It allows you to crush multiple rocks and items, both for recycling and for efficiently extracting strange minerals.
It is also indispensable for automating raw material production (creating automatic farms).
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest8369838624: You can &bcreate andesite casing&r by placing a &bstripped wood block&r and right-clicking it with &bandesite alloy&r in hand.
&oYou can also &bplace&r casings &bon gears&r, axles, and more; to cover their faces and prevent interactions with some adjacent elements. &bTry it&r!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest8525442612: Allows combining various items and liquids, applying heat below can do even more!
&o&8Tip: If something you don’t want is created, use filters or change the order in which you supply the items.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest8705657292: -The &b&lfluid storage tank&r allows &bstoring or extracting fluids&r whenever a mechanical pump is connected.
· &b&nIf absorbing&r, it will gather liquid blocks &bupto the hose tip&r height. If connected to an infinite source (like an ocean), it provides an infinite water supply.
-The &b&lfluid valve&r with its &b&lhandle&r, allows &bfluid flow regulation&r, either blocking or allowing passage. Opens with shift + right-click.

-The portable fluid interface allows a &emoveable gadget&r &o&7(check the mission of &dMachines and Mobile Gadgets&r&7)&r to transfer liquids to an exterior system with another &b&lportable fluid interface&r, maintaining a one-block distance between them.
-The &b&lfluid pipes&r enable &bfluid passage&r, &bconnecting&r different devices that handle fluids.

-The &b&lmechanical pump&r is used to create the motion that &bmoves a fluid&r in a direction &bwithin the system&r, indicated by an arrow at the element's opening. Additionally, it &nrequires RPM to function&r.
&oUse a wrench to change the direction.&r
-The &b&lspout&r allows &bapplying or refilling&r an object or bucket &bwith the provided liquid&r, &bto a tank or belt&r located below.
-The &b&ldrain&r permits &bdraining liquids&r from a bucket or container.
&o&7If an adjacent belt is placed here, it will collect the buckets and drain them, expelling them empty or leaving them on another belt (depends on the belt’s direction)&r
-The &b&lhose pulley&r allows &bextracting or supplying liquids&r to a place.
· &b&nIf expelling&r, it will fill in layers &bup to&r being &bone block&r &bbefore the hose origin&r.
Fluids and How to Control Them
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest8824875814: -You can &bconnect&r &blarge gears&r together in a &bperpendicular&r (L-shape) by their toothed sides.
-You can &bconnect small gears&r adjoining (same plane) by their toothed sides.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest8837526795: If you &bconnect&r the &b&lfan&r &bto&r a &bgenerator&r to &bblow air&r, and then place one of the &b&lstated blocks&r, such as lava, in front, you'll create a very hot air current that &byou can use&r &bto&r smelt resources. If used with a firepit, you can cook food. The mentioned blocks have different uses.
&7&oYou can: &bsmelt (lava) , smoke (firepit), wash (water) and irradiate (soul campfire)&r
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest8966558192: In a &bbasin&r with a &bmechanical mixer&r on top, and a &bblaze burner&r with &nmanaged fuel&r below, place &bcopper and zinc ingots&r.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest9077730512: You can connect a large gear to a small gear diagonally.
-If the &blarge gear&r is &bconnected&r to the generator, connecting it to a &bsmall gear&r (diagonally) will &bdouble the speed&r (&bRPM&r).
-If the generator feeds a &bsmall gear&r and it's &bconnected&r &bto&r a &blarge&r one (diagonally), the &bRPM&r &bwill be halved&r.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest9148835477: One way to overheat a blaze burner, but not the only one...
ftbquests.chapter.create.title: &l&6ReCreate the World&r
ftbquests.chapter.create_a_village.quest: Used to revive someone by interacting with their grave.
The &bblueprints&r (blueprints) help you make a village; to make a basic structure (a house), you need a room with a bed and a door.
To make more structures, check the blueprints or the construction book.
- The &6camera&r allows you to take pictures to save later.
- With the &6album&r, you can store and view various photos, add new ones with &bshift + right-click&r.
With a &bvaccine&r, you can cure villagers (&ashift&r+&aright-click&r) of the zombie infection, and if their name appears in green, gift them a golden apple.
It’s time to think about what to do during calm periods.
&o&7Tip: Read, Death and How to Cure It.
Your First Rank in the Village

ftbquests.chapter.food.quest154245930620: In this course, you'll learn the basics to process animals and get the most out of the hunted animal.
ftbquests.chapter.food.quest174084805369: &fHave you ever needed something nutritious during flight?
&fLet us tell you the &e&lbenefits&r&f of &a&lcanned food&r&f: long-lasting, easy to transport, and instant energy.

ftbquests.chapter.food.quest214633408349: &fEquip yourself with a &6basic rod&r&f and cast your line to ensure your first catch.
ftbquests.chapter.food.quest223610022128: &fCentral requests that you send all edible plants you find (&a&lTubers&r&f, &aSeeds&r&f, &aMushrooms&r&f) to study how they have developed in the new world.
ftbquests.chapter.food.quest240832914854: &fTired of fishing manually for food? Create a &afish trap&r&f and add &a&lbait&r&f; they'll catch themselves.
ftbquests.chapter.food.quest255356445261: &fCentral's &2forestry&r&f agency is interested in receiving &a&lseeds&r&f from different trees and plants.
ftbquests.chapter.food.quest296701682897: &fIn &2Wasteland Food&r&f we keep you up to date with the latest in food and processing methods.
ftbquests.chapter.food.quest300448692504: &fUse a knife to harvest more meat with the same resources.
&fAdditionally, the chopping board is versatile: useful for chopping meat and stripping tree bark.
ftbquests.chapter.food.quest313705849460: 1- Hang the &banimal skin&r on a &bdrying rack&r, ensuring it's well-stretched.
2- Then, &bdampen it&r with a sponge or cloth soaked in water.
3- Add a bit of &bsalt&r, which you can obtain by filtering water, to cure the skin.
Finally, after a wait, &ncollect the treated skin (leather)&r.
ftbquests.chapter.food.quest318015278420: &fFirst, you will need a &6keg&r&f that we will fill with the right ingredients to prepare some pints.
&fAfter a short wait, the drink will be ready.
ftbquests.chapter.food.quest370024021081: &fPrepare various sodas (red, green or blue) to stay hydrated on the road.
&fBottled drinks last longer and give you a slight energy boost.
ftbquests.chapter.food.quest416392109558: First, finish off an animal with your butcher's knife (Iron Clever) or with a butchering enchantment.
Then, place a hook on a chain and set a blood grate below, leaving a 2-meter gap. Hang the animal and proceed to bleed it with the knife.
&6–&r If you wish to obtain leather, use a knife to skin it. Then, use the butcher's knife to separate the meat.
&6–&r If you prefer more meat, bleed the animal with the butcher's knife; then, cut the meat into parts on the chopping board.
Blood can be cleaned with a rag or small sponges.
ftbquests.chapter.food.quest510534355468: &fTilling the land is one of the oldest jobs. Join me and learn to become a true farmer.
ftbquests.chapter.food.quest570172073654: &fOrganic fertilizer is left outside to turn into rich soil, where crops grow faster.
ftbquests.chapter.food.quest576098192133: &fTo create more complex dishes, you might need a &6grill&r&f, allowing you to use both a pot and a &6pan&r&f.

I have many questions, but better not to raise them now. Especially if you complete this shipment...
This will help check how radiation and other environmental effects impact organisms.
They need you to send bodies of various organisms... of all kinds.

ftbquests.chapter.refined_storage.quest1: &fGather the necessary components, &7iron ingots&r&f and &equantum cores&r&f, to assemble your first advanced storage terminal.
&fInstall the disk unit to &7store up to 8 media&r&f in a single interface.
- &fFor the chest network to work, you need an &a&lconnector&r&f that links the chests and the terminal.
- Place the &bterminal&r&f adjacent to the connector and organize the chests adjacently.
&fAdd the crafting terminal to &bview, extract, and upload&r&f items, in addition to &fcrafting directly&r&f.
ftbquests.chapter.refined_storage.quest2: &fAll blocks from &bRefined Storage&r&f must be connected to the &acontroller&r&f or through &ecables&r&f.
The &ey alternator&r transforms EU into FE; make sure you have at least &e32&r of rotational speed.
ftbquests.chapter.refined_storage.quest4: &fEnables the creation of a &bdisk&r with a capacity of &e16,000 items&r in a single block.
Allows you to access the terminal from 16 blocks or less.
ftbquests.chapter.refined_storage.quest5: &fUnlock the &bdisc&r&f for &e64,000 items&r to master your inventory.
&fIf you need a quick solution to store everything in one place, use the &bTom's Storage&r&f system.
Connect your chests to the &aterminal&r&f and you're all set to enjoy!
ftbquests.chapter.refined_storage.quest6: &fCraft a &bdisc&r capable of storing &e4,000 items&r and enhance your resource management.
ftbquests.chapter.refined_storage.quest7: &fPlace the remote view block to &bview, extract, and upload items&r&f from your terminal.
&fCreate a &bdisc&r with a capacity of &e1,000 items&r to start your storage network.
- &fUse &e&lcables&r&f to connect a storage system to the connector.
- Also, upgrade the &bterminal&r&f to craft directly from your inventory.
&fDo you find yourself always running out of &cspace&r&f?
Your &6chests&r&f are full of &7useless blocks&r&f... and you don't want to throw anything away.
&fPresenting the new &bquantum storage&r&f technology, developed in the year &e2270&r&f, with &lunlimited&r&f capacity.
&fGet ready to say goodbye to the “full chest syndrome” and &n&olaugh&r&f when your friends see your invention. The future awaits!
ftbquests.chapter.refined_storage.quest8: Allows access to the terminal within 64 block range, provided the terminal's chunk is loaded.
Place an active beacon nearby for access from any point.
ftbquests.chapter.refined_storage.title: &l&9Efficient Storage!&r
A weapon capable of dissevering infected enemies and removing certain parts.
Causes the weapon to inflict Corrosion II for 3 seconds on the target hit.
&8Corrosion reduces the player's armor value by 10%% and wears it down over time (loses 1 durability in 3 seconds).&r
&fOnce rebuilt, it shows the progress achieved by the hive mind.
– Shows the &alocation&r of Hiveminds and Calamities within a margin of error of &a50 blocks&r&f.
– It has the possibility of &c&nbetraying your position&r&f.
&o&7(Shift + Right Click to view usage interface and requirements) &r
&fA dangerous fungus, known as &4The Red Plague&r&f, was discovered centuries ago and has ravaged this world.
&fUse the laboratory to extract vital data.
&fYou will need strong and specially designed armor to protect yourself.
&fThe mask protects you from spores while you wear it.
&fThe spores are &b&lweak to the cold&r&f; this device temporarily reduces the infection.
– Feed it with ice canisters (10 minutes of autonomy).
– Eradicates Spore in an area of &a20×20×20&r&f blocks.
&o&7(Shift + Right Click to view usage interface) &r
&fIf you collect this plant, you will be able to craft a vaccine against the &c&lZombie Infection&r&f.
Entities that harm the bearer suffer from jagged thorns damage equivalent to 3.5 times the enchantment level.
&o&8It will also apply poison or corrosion for 2 seconds, the duration increasing by 2 seconds per enchantment level.
Use Spore mod syringes to fire and load them with right-click. It also allows extracting samples from infected with left-click, which you can then launch.
Applies bile debuffs to the targeted entity &o&8 (Blindness, Weakness, and Slowness I for 5 seconds and Mining Fatigue I for 10 seconds)&r.
It has 18 storage slots and is immune to destruction by infected.
&fThe scanner provides detailed information about scanned Spore mobs.
You can also analyze certain items in your inventory by dragging the scanner over the items and using right-click.
&fUse it before entering highly contaminated areas.
&fAn incubator useful for repairing organic tools.
– Regenerates the durability of Spore items using biomass.
&o&7(Shift + Right Click to view usage interface) &r
&fSometimes a horde of zombies will appear: wear &b&larmor&r&f to protect against bites.
&fThe infection causes cell death and tissue decomposition, leading to spasms in advanced stages.
When an item is below 100%% durability, you can right-click in the inventory with a generic piece of meat to restore a maximum of 50 durability points.
&o&8When applied to a helmet, there's a 10%% chance that the user will receive 6 hunger points when damaging an entity.
By loading it with Ice Canisters, it deals significant damage to enemies infected by the spores (triple, depending on the charge), although consecutive hits have less effect
&fAnalyze different organisms: tubers, fungi, fruits, and more.
&fSend samples to Central to evaluate their healing potential.
Slowly repairs the given item while in the player's inventory.
Only works if the player has the Symbiosis effect.
&fGrind the &aFox Weed&r&f to obtain a base healing liquid.
&fUse a surgery table to perform &b&nexperiments&r&f with infected tissues.
&oInside the table, you can change the interface by clicking on the papers at the bottom right.
&o&7(Optionally, you can add Agents, maximum 1 of each, to enhance certain attributes) &r
&fRemember to provide enough fuel to maintain the &a&loptimal&r&f temperature.
&fHow to use and the functionality of the BCU (Bio-Containment Unit, unaffected by "Mound tendrils"):
– Tendrils prevent placement of Chest Mounds; use the BCU for greater security.
&fThe vaccine &a&lstops&r&f and eliminates the bacteria of decay.
&fAdminister it in time to keep your body free of infection.
When hitting a creature, increases its freezing time by 15 seconds.
&8Deals additional damage to infected creatures, as they are weak to cold.&r

ftbquests.chapter.tacz.quest790299060770: &fCreate a &aHandcrafted Stock&r&f to improve recoil control, ideal for beginners.
ftbquests.chapter.tacz.quest825210990715: &fPress &eN&r&f to open your inventory or interact while running.
&fTake advantage of receiving handling tips and master your weapon!
ftbquests.chapter.tacz.quest827160792563: &fCreate a heavy weapon designed to dominate the battlefield: slow but devastating.
ftbquests.chapter.tacz.quest840451453573: &fCraft the legendary &cRFK&r&f and wield one of the most powerful light machine guns.
ftbquests.chapter.tacz.quest865903464907: &fCreate a Stone Statue to showcase your most prized weapons.
ftbquests.chapter.tacz.quest882834388132: &fThe Armory Table is your essential tool for crafting and customizing firearms.
ftbquests.chapter.tacz.quest901089095472: &fForge specialized ammo improvements and customize your projectiles for each encounter:\n\
&c• Incendiary Ammunition&r&f: set your enemies on fire\n\
&d• Hollow Point&r&f: maximize detonation power against light armor\n\
&e• Explosive Rounds&r&f: cause light explosions on impact\n\
&a• Full Metal Jacket&r&f: penetrate armor and obstacles
&7Enhance your bullets and dominate the field!&r
ftbquests.chapter.tacz.title: &l&5The Ultimate Arsenal!&r
ftbquests.chapter.travel_the_world.quest: &fUse &bcarts&r&f and &bmounted chests&r&f to transport entities and items.
&fWith &eshift+right click&r&f on the cart, open its inventory and manage your load on the go.
&fPress &bCaps Lock&r&f to ride and control the horse while aiming with the bow.
&fEquip a &crein&r&f to steer your steed without dismounting.
Here you will learn to build &byour own Kart&r step by step.
&fFollow the plans to assemble a &bsubmarine&r that can dive into the darkest zones.
&fLearn to place thrusters and reinforced hull to master the abyss.
&fTune in to our tutorial frequency to master takeoffs and landings.
&fAdjust ailerons and control the rudder like a true aero pilot.
&fCreate your glider with &bcloth aileron&r&f and practice gentle glides from height.
&fAnd enhance your capabilities in subsequent missions (tiers).
&fPrepare the structure with &664 units of wood&r&f to achieve a light and resistant airplane.
&fAdjust propellers and engine until finding the perfect balance of speed and flight.
&fUse a &bmonocle&r&f to gauge your horse's stats.
&fFeeding it with a &egolden apple&r&f increases taming probability by &l10%%&r&f.
&fInstall a coal engine in your aircraft for brute power.
&fGet ready for a robust and somewhat noisy flight, filled with character!
&fDiscover the improved version, sleeker and more entertaining than ever.
&fIdeal for aerobatic flights and stylish landscape overflights.
&lIs it a Bird? No, It's a Plane!&r
&fDownload the pack with &aupgrades released every Saturday&r&f and apply them to your world.
&fKeep your experience always up to date with the most useful innovations.
&fIdeal for beginners, this airship offers stable and reliable handling.
&fNote that its speed is moderate, perfect for leisurely exploration.
&fIn this special episode, craft a &edrill&r&f to bore through rock and extract minerals.
&fAdd reinforcements to the drill and connect its engine for maximum efficiency.
You can change the colors of your Kart with &6dyes.&r
&fCrafting the basic parts, &7wings, fuselage, and engine&r&f, will be your first step.
&fFollow the plan to the letter and get ready for takeoff.
&fMaximize your capacity with this airship capable of carrying large volumes.
&fEnsure you have enough &adiesel&r&f or &ccoal&r&f, as its consumption is high.
&fInstall a &6furnace&r&f on your ship to burn fuel and speed up your navigation.
&fEnsure you have enough &ccoal&r&f or &ewood&r&f to keep the fire burning.
ftbquests.chapter.travel_the_world.title: &l&1Move Around the World&r
ftbquests.chapter.tutorial1_introduction: &fFind the item on the list and start &lcommunicating&r&f.
&fMark important locations and create &awaypoints&r&f to coordinate your team.
&fWhen you see the &ablueprint icon&r&f, you'll know you're facing a construction mission.
&fPlace the structure in the desired location with &bRight Click&r&f to begin building.
&fUpon completion, return to the mission and press the icon to confirm your masterpiece.
&fLooking at the tips icon, you will receive &buseful suggestions&r&f for each mission.
They can also redirect you to a mission or missions with more details.
Create &nyour own world&r multiplayer &l24h&r where you can survive with your friends.
- &624/7 Support&r (they can automatically upload your modpacks!).
&fManage your claimed chunks with the key &b<->&r&f.
&fForm &2alliances&r&f from the beginning; together you're stronger!
&o&f&dTip:&r&f If you want to sync your quests with your party, create an FTB Teams party using the interface in the inventory menu or with the /ftbteams commands.&r
&fStart your world on &n&oLAN&r&f to get a &bunique IP&r&f and let your friends join.
&fRemember: in &c&lmultiplayer&r&f, the action intensifies with more &4zombies&r&f and &dchallenges&r&f!
Friend or not friend, that's the question
&fUse &bEMI&r&f to search for items, effects, and achievements precisely.
&fThe search bar is located at the bottom of your inventory.
&fUse &a'@'&r&f to filter by mod and find what you need.
- Use &b&nleft click&r or &n&b"r"&r to see &bacquisition methods or recipes&r.
- Use &b&nright click&r or &n&b"u"&r to see &busages or utilities&r.
• &aRequest help&r&f with mods, quests, and crazy builds
&9&lThe perfect place not to survive alone!&r
&fAccess the quests from the &btablet&r&f in the upper left corner of your inventory or with F7.
&fAs you progress, you will &aunlock&r&f more complex quests. Explore and conquer!
&fSome challenges only require marking as completed; don't underestimate their importance!
&cGet ready for a zombie apocalypse&7 where every decision counts and survival is your only priority!
&dDiscover the secrets of the cataclysm that ravaged civilization, hidden among ruins and infected hordes.
&bYour mission: &leradicate the infection&r&b, &lsave the survivors&r&b, and &lrebuild from the ashes&r&b.
&fPress &bF6&r&f to open the emotes menu and showcase your unique personality.
&fCustomize, &aedit&r&f or download your own emotes to &lemote&r&f in each interaction.
ftbquests.chapter.tutorial2.quest1696862: &fOver time, your &c&lfatigue&r&f will increase; upon reaching &a&l100%%&r&f, you can sleep at night.
&fCheck the &c&lfatigue&r&f indicator on the side of your inventory.
ftbquests.chapter.tutorial2.quest1796998: &fYour mental health may deteriorate, but you can also &2&lrecover it&r&f.
ftbquests.chapter.tutorial2.quest2380014: &fThe infection is transmitted through blood. If a zombie attacks you, &cbe careful!&r&f
&fThe healing powers of a golden apple keep the infection at bay.
ftbquests.chapter.tutorial2.quest2557436: &fThe world is full of &c&ldangers&r&f, but you are &o&nprepared&r&f to face them.
ftbquests.chapter.tutorial2.quest2994467: &fAs days pass, the &a&oinfection&r&f and the infected will become &c&lstronger and more aggressive&r&f.
&f&o&nDon't get too distracted&r&f or you could lose everything.
